title: Emerald Cascade Jhumka - పచ్చల జూకాలు (Pachala Jookalu)
materials: meticulously crafted and studded with high-quality Zambian Emeralds with excellent clarity and brilliant cut. Accentuated with dazzling CZ diamonds (American Diamonds) using a Hyderabadi Kundan setting technique for a timeless appeal.
features: Exquisite chandelier-style Jhumkas featuring intricate filigree work embellished with Emeralds. The design embodies the essence of traditional South Indian craftsmanship with a modern touch, perfect for the contemporary bride. The open setting allows for maximum light reflection, enhancing the brilliance of the gemstones.
colors: a classic and auspicious combination in South Indian jewelry
complemented by the dazzling white of the CZ diamonds.
occasions: and other festive occasions where a touch of elegance and tradition is desired. Also suitable for high-end parties and cultural events.
description: Timeless design blending tradition with modern elegance. Handcrafted by skilled artisans from Hyderabad. Features high-quality Zambian Emeralds known for their rich color. The intricate filigree work and Kundan setting showcase unparalleled craftsmanship. A heirloom piece to be cherished for generations.
